Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '?', 3: "We'll have to try a forced awakening if you fail as well.", 4: '1', 18: '100010577'}
{2: '?', 3: "...And take care of yourself... Don't throw your life away before you can rescue her.", 4: '1', 18: '100010588'}
{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>The snow... there... is too heavy...</size></color>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '-3', 10: '1'}

{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>Have to find her... bring her back... bring her back to...</size></color>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>...Your side.</size></color>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "...January sure lives up to its reputation with this damn blizzard. Davis, what's the situation up ahead?", 4: '1', 18: '100010489'}
{3: 'You are so cold.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Davis', 3: "Whew... I see... a light! We're almost there—there's a church up ahead!", 4: '2', 18: '100010490'}
{2: 'Squad Captain', 3: 'Hah... I just hope whatever has been chasing us is as lost as we are.', 4: '1', 18: '100010491'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'Your body hurts so much.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Squad Captain', 3: '...Still losing blood. The commandant might not... last much longer.', 4: '1', 18: '100010493'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab'}
{2: '(Force your eyes open)', 3: '46'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1290.jpg'}
{3: 'All that meets your eye is endless night. A kerosene lamp sways with the jolting vehicle, casting a dim yellow light that is immediately swallowed by the swirling snow.'}
{3: 'The howling wind hits your body, stealing away what little warmth remains.'}
{2: 'Squad Captain', 3: "Commandant's awake!", 4: '1', 18: '100010494'}
{3: 'When you wake up, the young man jogging by the wagon anxiously climbs inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Davis', 3: "By the Holy Maiden's grace, hang in there!", 4: '1', 18: '100010495'}
{3: 'He uses his frail body to block the wind, pulling off his coat and wrapping it tightly around you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Squad Captain', 3: 'What is Commandant saying?', 4: '1', 18: '100010496'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: "It's a name, but I can't make it out—", 4: '2', 18: '100010497'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: "It's okay, Commandant, we're almost there. Once we reach the church, the Holy Maiden will surely take us in!", 4: '2', 18: '100010498'}
{2: 'Squad Captain', 3: 'Are we stopping at the church? We have no time to waste! Those things might still be chasing us!', 4: '1', 18: '100010499'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: 'If they were that powerful, they would have wiped us out in that last battle.', 4: '2', 18: '100010500'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: 'We are still alive only because we worked together... How is pushing through this blizzard any different from abandoning our wounded brothers?', 4: '2', 18: '100010501'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: "We'll stop at the church up ahead and wait for them to recover a bit before we continue.", 4: '2', 18: '100010502'}
{2: 'Squad Captain', 3: "...You're right. Hyah!", 4: '1', 18: '100010503'}
{3: 'Horse hooves kick up swirling snow as excruciating pain claws its way up, dragging your consciousness into darkness.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "So... you're hoping the church can temporarily shelter your troops?", 4: '1', 18: '100010504'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: "Yes... Miss Bonnie, I believe, with the church's...", 4: '2', 18: '100010505'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: 'Uh... But we can help if the church runs into any problems!', 4: '2', 18: '100010507'}
{2: 'Bonnie', 3: "Don't play dumb! This blizzard's been going on for almost a month. Surely you know that, right?", 4: '1', 18: '100010508'}
{2: "(What's... happening?)", 3: '87'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory710.jpg'}
{3: 'You force open your tired eyelids. You can just make out a few figures that are currently in a heated argument.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bonnie', 3: "The town's supplies have been cut off completely. The children barely have enough to eat! Where would we find extra food to feed a bunch of soldiers?", 4: '1', 18: '100010509'}
{3: "Hearing Bonnie's biting response, the squad captain quietly grips his sword, but Davis stops him."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Child 1', 3: "Sister Bonnie, but the Holy Maiden said... they're the ones protecting us...", 4: '1', 18: '100010511'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bonnie', 3: 'Rosie, listen, their blades can protect us, but they can hurt us just as easily.', 4: '2', 18: '100010512'}
{2: 'Bonnie', 3: "The church doesn't have much food left. These are desperate times... We have to turn them away. God will forgive us.", 4: '2', 18: '100010513'}
{3: 'After quietly speaking to the child beside her, she lifts her head and says with a mocking tone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bonnie', 3: 'Before you arrived, three other groups had already tried to talk their way in here with all sorts of reasons.', 4: '1', 18: '100010514'}
{2: 'Bonnie', 3: "I suppose your camp has run out of food, too, and that's why you came running to the church to beg for help?", 4: '1', 18: '100010515'}
{2: '(Open your eyes)', 3: '112'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Just as you try to sit up and explain, gentle hands touch you from behind and press you back down.'}
{3: 'Your gaze drifts upward and meets a pair of pure and divine eyes.'}
{3: "Surprisingly, she doesn't remember you at all."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'However, your face... seems familiar, Commandant. Have we met somewhere before?', 4: '1', 18: '100010518'}
{3: 'She moves her gaze away and focuses on applying ointment to your wounds.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "The church hasn't decided whether they will take you in, but your injuries are the most severe. The soldiers asked me if I could tend to you first.", 4: '1', 18: '100010520'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I wanted to carry you over to the fireplace, but you have multiple fractures. It's too risky to move you right now.", 4: '1', 18: '100010521'}
{3: "Instead of the ice-cold, blade-like wind and snow, gentle warmth surrounds you. You suddenly realize you're resting in her arms."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'This is all I can do to ease your pain...', 4: '1', 18: '100010522'}
{3: 'After applying the last of the medicine, she gently touches your cheek with her hand.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'So, can you tell me what happened?', 4: '1', 18: '100010523'}
{2: "I... can't remember clearly...", 3: '139'}
{3: 'Davis might know, but that young man is still pleading with the nun to let all of you stay.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Davis', 3: 'Miss Bonnie, we were suddenly attacked east of here just two hours ago... by monsters that appeared during the plague.', 4: '2', 18: '100010524'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: 'To intercept them, the other three squads were completely wiped out. Only our commandant managed to lead us out.', 4: '2', 18: '100010525'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: 'Besides the dozen or so critically wounded soldiers, our commandant is also severely injured.', 4: '2', 18: '100010526'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: "We have nowhere else to go in this weather. For the Holy Maiden's sake, please take us in, even if it's just for one night.", 4: '2', 18: '100010527'}
{2: 'Bonnie', 3: 'We can let you stay for one night, sure, but what if you ask to stay again tomorrow?', 4: '1', 18: '100010530'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosie', 3: 'Sister Bonnie, please let them stay... I... I...', 4: '1', 18: '100010531'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bonnie', 3: "No one wants to see this happen, my child, but letting them stay means you won't have enough to eat.", 4: '1', 18: '100010532'}
{2: 'Bonnie', 3: "Many children are already sick... I don't want to lose any one of you.", 4: '1', 18: '100010533'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: "I swear—I'll even swear to the Holy Maiden herself. Just one night, please...", 4: '2', 18: '100010534'}
{3: 'Bianca calls out softly, but in a firm tone.'}
{3: "Bonnie's agitated expression and stiff posture soften at the sound of Bianca's voice."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Monsters from the east... I've heard of them from the devotees.", 4: '1', 18: '100010538'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'If these soldiers were injured while fighting to protect us, then we should help them.', 4: '1', 18: '100010539'}
{3: "Bianca's gaze sweeps over the dying soldiers, the raging blizzard, and finally settles on you in her arms."}
{3: "Just as she's about to speak, a child tugs at her hem."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Child 2', 3: 'Sister Bianca... when can we pray again?', 4: '2', 18: '100010541'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Well... Venice, do you have anything you'd like to say to God?", 4: '1', 18: '100010542'}
{2: 'Venice', 3: "I don't have much to say. Just... my sister hasn't eaten anything for an entire day. She's lying in bed and is too weak to move.", 4: '2', 18: '100010543'}
{2: 'Venice', 3: "Sister Bianca, I want to pray one more time so my sister will have something to eat, and then she'll get better, right?", 4: '2', 18: '100010544'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bonnie', 3: "Prayer won't help, Venice. We don't have enough food... so each person can only eat every other day. No matter how much we pray, we won't get more food.", 4: '1', 18: '100010546'}
{2: 'Bonnie', 3: 'We no longer have the ability to care for others.', 4: '1', 18: '100010547'}
{3: 'Bianca closes her eyes in pain and falls silent.'}
{3: 'After a while, she slowly reaches for the sword at her waist.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bonnie', 3: 'Holy Maiden, are you going to draw the Sacred Sword for complete strangers?!', 4: '1', 18: '100010548'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront81.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{3: 'It is an elegant yet fierce silver longsword... When the eyes focus on it, shadows appear across the retina...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront81.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.25'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "We're all trapped by the blizzard, many of the soldiers are severely wounded, and the children are getting sick from hunger...", 4: '1', 18: '100010549'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "...With the Sacred Sword's power, we could find enough food, the troops could stay, and the children wouldn't go hungry.", 4: '1', 18: '100010550'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bonnie', 3: 'What about its curse?! Father Snow warned us before he left, "Do not draw the Sacred Sword unless absolutely necessary!"', 5: '2', 18: '100010551'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "You blink again, but the shadows only seem to coil around the Sacred Sword's blade, emanating a subtle sense of discord..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But... Bonnie... I believe no one should be abandoned...', 4: '1', 18: '100010552'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '?', 3: '...Protect her. Keep her away from anything that might cause her pain.', 4: '1', 18: '100010586'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory710.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Her hand moves slowly to draw the Sacred Sword from its sheath—'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{2: "Don't be impulsive. There must be another way.", 3: '237'}
{2: 'Can you help me up?', 3: '238'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'What do you want? Your wounds will tear open.', 4: '1', 18: '100010554'}
{3: 'She presses her hand gently against your chest to stop you from sitting up.'}
{2: "I'm... their commandant.", 3: '243'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "If there's anything you'd like to say to them, I can relay it for you, okay?", 4: '1', 18: '100010555'}
{2: 'Thank you, Bianca.', 3: '246'}
{3: 'Her hand, which was blocking your chest, moves to gently support your back.'}
{2: 'Help me get the food from the wagon.', 3: '254'}
{2: 'Give half of it to the children.', 3: '255'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Davis', 3: "Huh? ...But we left in such a hurry before the battle. That's our last bit of food.", 4: '1', 18: '100010558'}
{2: 'Davis', 3: "You're severely injured. You'll need food to regain your energy while you recover...", 4: '1', 18: '100010559'}
{2: "It's okay. We'll find more food soon.", 3: '259'}
{3: 'Bonnie casts a suspicious look.'}
{2: 'Miss Bonnie, the blizzard has cut off your food supply.', 3: '263'}
{2: 'But the squad can help hunt for more food.', 3: '264'}
{2: 'Now, most of us are battered and trapped by the snow...', 3: '265'}
{2: "But we'll bring the church more food if you shelter us.", 3: '266'}
{2: "We'll get through this harsh winter if we work together.", 3: '267', 18: '100010560'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosie', 3: 'Sister Bonnie... can we please let the soldiers stay...', 4: '1', 18: '100010562'}
{2: 'Venice', 3: "Sister Bonnie... my little sister finally won't have to go hungry anymore. God saved my little sister. Will He save these kind soldiers, too?", 4: '2', 18: '100010563'}
{2: 'Bonnie', 3: 'Holy Maiden, please make your decision.', 4: '1', 18: '100010565'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.4', 5: '0.5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '...While the blizzard is raging, the church will temporarily shelter everyone.', 4: '1', 18: '100010566'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'May God bless the wounded soldiers with a smooth recovery and the church with plentiful food...', 4: '1', 18: '100010567'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.3', 4: '0.7', 5: '0.5'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'And thank you as well, Commandant. Now, please get some rest...', 4: '1', 18: '100010568'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Wait, something's not right with your breathing and heart rate...", 4: '1', 18: '100010569'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.7', 4: '0.8', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'Thump!'}
{3: 'Your consciousness sinks into a soft darkness.'}
